name: Pfizer
history: Founded in 1849 by cousins Charles Pfizer and Charles Erhart in Brooklyn, New York. Became a pioneer in pharmaceutical manufacturing.

name: Moderna
history: Founded in 2010, pioneered messenger RNA (mRNA) therapeutics and vaccines. First FDA-approved product in 2021.
vaccine_candidates: CMV Vaccine, Cancer Vaccines, HIV Vaccine

name: GlaxoSmithKline
history: Formed in 2000 by merger of Glaxo Wellcome and SmithKline Beecham. One of world's largest pharmaceutical companies.

name: Sanofi
history: Formed through merger of Sanofi-Synthélabo and Aventis in 2004. Leading global healthcare company.
vaccine_candidates: Dengue Vaccine Phase III, Zika Vaccine

name: AstraZeneca
history: Formed in 1999 by merger of Swedish Astra AB and British Zeneca Group.
